articles.title: Flacco finds vintage form as Bengals win battle of 40-something QBs
articles.summary: Joe Flacco and Aaron Rodgers put on a duel for the ages in Cincinnati on Thursday.

articles.title: Flacco savors Bengals' victory after uncertainty
articles.summary: Following his benching in Cleveland and his trade to Cincinnati, Joe Flacco said the opportunity to lead the Bengals to a comeback win was "pretty special."

articles.title: Steelers blame 'unacceptable' run defense for loss
articles.summary: After Thursday night's loss, numerous Steelers defensive players said the root of the problem was their inability to stop the league's worst rushing attack, as the Bengals put up a season-high 142 yards, nearly more than double their previous best.

articles.title: Rodgers passes Big Ben in yards, now 5th all time
articles.summary: Aaron Rodgers overtook former Steelers great Ben Roethlisberger for fifth on the NFL's all-time passing yards list during Thursday night's loss to the Bengals.

articles.title: Parsons calls out one-sided officiating, tush push
articles.summary: Micah Parsons made his feelings known Thursday on offensive players getting away with holding far too often and his disdain for the Eagles' tush push play.

articles.title: Amid rumors, Saints' Kamara wants to stay put
articles.summary: Saints running back Alvin Kamara and wide receiver Chris Olave were asked about the rampant trade rumors surrounding them Thursday.

articles.title: 49ers' Kittle: 'Fully plan' to return vs. Falcons
articles.summary: George Kittle, who has been out with a hamstring injury since the season opener, said he plans to play Sunday when San Francisco hosts Atlanta.

articles.title: Lamb set to rejoin Cowboys for Commanders tilt
articles.summary: CeeDee Lamb said he is ready to return to the lineup Sunday against the Commanders after missing the past three games with a high left ankle sprain.

articles.title: Source: Commanders picking up WR Burks
articles.summary: The Commanders are signing veteran receiver Treylon Burks to their practice squad, a source confirmed Thursday.
